message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you an exclusive opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $11,500.  What do you think?

I appreciate your offer, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'd like to get as close to the value of the product as possible. What do you think?

Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand you're looking for a good deal. While $9,000 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $10,500. It's a fair compromise that reflects the true value of this product. What do you say?

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, $10,500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll offer $10,000. I think this is a fair price considering the value of the product. What do you think?
